app.title: Donna AI Song & Music Maker
app.description:
Donna AI Song & Music Maker is your ultimate AI song generator and AI music maker. Unleash your creativity with our advanced AI song maker, effortlessly transforming descriptions, lyrics, or images into captivating music. As a leading AI music generator, we offer limitless possibilities in music and audio creation, fully powered by innovative music AI technology.

With the Donna AI song generator, crafting original music has never been easier or more enjoyable. Simply type a description, and our AI music generator quickly produces unique, high-quality tracks tailored to your imagination. Whether you're looking for catchy pop hits, emotional ballads, powerful rock anthems, or vibrant AI rap tracks, this versatile AI song generator offers hundreds of genres and moods to match your musical vision perfectly.

Enter your lyrics directly into Donna, your personal AI song writer, and watch as our AI music generator masterfully composes beautiful melodies and perfect arrangements. Alternatively, upload an image and let the AI song generator creatively turn it into an expressive, thematic song that resonates deeply.

Donna AI music maker provides flexible listening experiences with two distinct performance modes: enjoy vibrant Live Concert energy or pristine Studio quality audio. Choose male or female vocals to ensure your AI-generated music fits exactly what you envision.

Enhance your creativity with Donna AI Cover, a revolutionary feature within our AI music generator that allows you to upload your voice and create customized cover songs. AI Cover skillfully blends your vocals with professionally crafted music from the AI song generator, delivering an authentic and impressive result.

Extend and perfect your music effortlessly using the intuitive song extension capabilities built into the Donna AI song generator. This gives you complete control over song duration and composition. Additionally, our powerful audio separation tool‚Äîa key part of this AI music generator‚Äîmakes it simple to split songs into vocals, drums, bass, and instrumentals, ideal for remixing and refining your tracks.

Create personalized playlists and showcase your AI-generated masterpieces with global audiences. Create your music and share it with the world!

Experience the unlimited creativity of Donna AI, the perfect AI song generator for beginners and professionals alike. Whether you're producing fully vocalized songs, catchy background tracks, or exploring diverse musical styles, our AI music generator empowers you to realize your musical dreams effortlessly and instantly.

Start your musical journey with Donna AI music generator free‚Äîreceive a complimentary song to experience its remarkable capabilities and see how Donna AI can transform your creative vision into reality.

‚ú® Key Features:

- Instantly convert your ideas into stunning music with our powerful AI music generator.
- Effortlessly turn lyrics or images into powerful music compositions with this creative AI song generator.
- Personalize songs by uploading your voice to create unique cover songs.
- Compose professional-quality original lyrics and melodies.
- Explore hundreds of genres and moods, from rap and pop to classical and rock.
- Generate royalty-free music creations with our AI song generator.
- Easily organize and share your ai music albums.
- Increase song lengths according to your exact requirements.
- Divide tracks into vocals, drums, bass, and instrumentals using the advanced tools of our AI music generator.
- Choose between Studio and Live Concert listening experiences.

Join thousands of satisfied users revolutionizing their musical creations. Download Donna AI Song Generator Free today, and start creating unforgettable music with unmatched ease and innovation! 

Privacy Policy: https://www.mobiversite.com/privacypolicy
Terms & Conditions: https://www.mobiversite.com/terms
EULA: https://www.mobiversite.com/eula

app.summary: Most Advanced AI Song Generator and Music Creator. Rap, Pop, Rock, Gospel & more

reviews.text: Perfect For Those With Dementia! If you have a loved one with Dementia, this is perfect for them! I have made so many songs using the description box and describing the person's likes, career, and other personal details. I then put in the type of music in as well. It is such a big hit! They love it so much and it makes them feel super special hearing their name. Music is great therapy for them. I put the music on a portable speaker and also play it in the car. Totally recommend! Great Music!

The 5.99 for a week option is a complete waste of money because you only get 20 song slots (even deleted ones count). I'm on day 1 and have already gone through all 20 slots. I went through 20 in 1 day because the AI is PRONE to messing up and being unintelligible. The female voice sounds terrible EVERY time I've tried to use it. It's high-pitched and sounds like she's trying to sing opera or absolute nonsense. THE $5.99 FOR A WEEK SHOULD BE 5.99 FOR A WEEK NOT FOR 20. It's a waste.

I was definitely curious because I heard that song the guy made about taking his dog to the moon. So I just thought that was so fun! I just created a song and it only took about 5 minutes. I put in the AI exactly what I wanted and the song is fantastic. Plus.... the cover art that the AI did for me was so perfect. I love how we can give a description and it does exactly what we want and makes it even better! I like how it helps us envision the experience and see endless creative possibilities.
reviews.replyText: We appreciate your positive feedback! Our AI song maker is here to make music creation accessible and fun. Keep exploring the many styles and options in our AI music generator and keep creating great songs.

reviews.text: *Better Before.* The app used to reliably make songs that were 3-4 minutes long and consistent. I had an entire album for a Cyberpunk campaign made and ready to go. Now I can't get the old voices back, and the longest song it's given me was 126 seconds - so it's incredibly fast-paced and unintelligible. The app used to be phenomenal. I bought a year subscription and some other bonuses. But now? Now, it's feeling like I'll never get to make those other songs even half way decently.
reviews.replyText: Improving AI can sometimes mean taking a step back before making a big leap forward. While we understand the frustration, every change is made with the goal of creating a better experience in the long run. We're constantly refining and optimizing, and we truly appreciate your patience. We're doing our best to bring back the quality you loved!

reviews.text: I have loved this app! Every song was turning out like I wanted and being able to use my own lyrics was a big perk! But now I just bought the yearly subscription and I can't even understand my lyrics. Some of the songs don't have words at all! Idk what has happened the past couple weeks but this sounds horrible right now! If they can fix this, I will adjust my review..
reviews.replyText: We're actively working on improving the AI‚Äôs accuracy with lyrics and pronunciation. We appreciate your patience and hope to bring back the great experience you loved. We‚Äôd love for you to adjust your review once things are better!

reviews.text: This app was great but a update broke thr song generation and now only makes 29 second songs, even if you use custom lyrics or have it generated for you, if they don't fix this issue they should be returning a lot of people's money... EDIT: 1/25/2025 They've fixed the 29 second issue and songs are working like before! They actually have added some features that they didn't have before and it makes it even better. They reached out to me also to let me know about the fix which was nice.
reviews.replyText: Thanks for your review! Our AI song maker aims to inspire your creativity and make music creation easy and enjoyable. Keep using our AI music generator to explore endless possibilities and craft songs that truly represent you.

reviews.text: Needs work, but personally worth 4 stars. It has a lot of potential, and there are plenty of great songs, but the words are read incorrectly, or hallucinations are present. I'd give a 5 star, if it weren't for the fact that you only get three AI generated image tokens, and they do not reset after paying for pro. I also do not like how instead of just recreating a song, it takes one of the 20 you have for the week to fix the AIs' mistakes. Need an option to edit lyrics for complete songs.
reviews.replyText: Thanks for your thoughtful review! We‚Äôre excited about the potential too and are continuously improving our AI song maker to reduce errors and add more flexibility. Editing full songs is on our roadmap, and we appreciate your patience as we enhance the AI music generator. Keep creating great music with us!

reviews.text: This is a cool app! There is a subscription of about 56 dollars. This app allows you to create a song by either writing the lyrics yourself, describing a song or putting an image with an optional description. I made a mother's day song that she absolutely loved. there are several moods and genres you can choose. I have only tried a handful of AI apps, but this one has blown me away. As of right now, I don't think I have found anything wrong. (This review was made before the update.)
reviews.replyText: Thanks for the great review! We‚Äôre proud to offer an AI song maker that lets you create music quickly and easily. Keep using our AI music generator to craft your best work and discover new creative horizons in music.

reviews.text: it's a nice app, nice music creation. the voices sound clean and real. though I do wish you could choose more then one style/genre. another thing would be to see how many songs you can make from the start. I still new to the app so I'm still trying to figure stuff out, overall easy to use. I'm pretty sure you get only one free song to make unless you get pro. I do suggest maybe giving starters at least 3 free song creations. I do recommend!
reviews.replyText: Thanks for your great feedback! We're glad you find the app easy to use and enjoy the clean, real-sounding voices. We're working on adding more styles and genres to the AI song generator. Also, we appreciate your suggestion about free song credits‚Äîour expenses limit us, but we‚Äôre always looking for ways to improve the experience.

reviews.text: Keeps getting worse and I'm regretting to have paid. Trying to get songs using the genre listed and also mentioning the same genre in the prompt doesn't work most of the time. Asking to have the song in brazilian portuguese doesn't work most of the time now, it's creating with Portugal's accent, this wasn't an issue almost an year ago when I started using the app. A lot of times the songs don't even get created and the wait time is at least 5 minutes or longer.
reviews.replyText: We‚Äôve made improvements to the AI, including addressing the wait times, which were caused by a temporary glitch. Regarding the genre and language accuracy, we're continuously working to enhance the app's performance, and we appreciate your feedback. We‚Äôre committed to delivering a better experience, and we hope you'll continue to give it a try.

app.AIReview:
Donna AI Song & Music Maker App Review

Overview

Donna AI Song & Music Maker has achieved significant traction within the music and audio creation space, boasting over 3.7 million installs and a robust 4.66 rating among its user base. Positioned as ‚Äúthe most advanced AI song generator and music creator,‚Äù the app capitalizes on the growing trend of accessible AI-powered music production. Users are offered the ability to transform text prompts ‚Äì descriptions, lyrics, even images ‚Äì into original musical compositions across a surprisingly diverse range of genres including rap, pop, rock, and gospel. The app‚Äôs free tier makes it immediately accessible, attracting a broad audience keen to experiment with AI music generation without financial commitment. However, given its popularity, a critical assessment is warranted to determine whether Donna AI Song & Music Maker truly lives up to its ambitious claims.

Key Features

The core functionality of Donna AI Song & Music Maker revolves around several key features designed to streamline the music creation process:

  • Text-to-Music Generation: This is the app‚Äôs defining feature. Users input a description (e.g., "upbeat pop song about summer love") and the AI generates an accompanying musical track. The system offers varying levels of control, allowing users to specify genre, mood, tempo, and even instrumentation.
  • Lyric Integration: Users can provide existing lyrics or generate them through the app‚Äôs AI lyric generator. This feature allows for a more direct connection between text and music.
  • Image-to-Music Generation: A notable differentiator, this allows users to upload an image and have the AI create music based on its visual content ‚Äì potentially identifying colors, objects, and overall aesthetic themes.
  • Genre Variety: The app supports a wide array of genres, including Pop, Rock, Hip Hop/Rap, EDM, Gospel, Country, R&B, and more. This broad selection caters to diverse musical tastes.
  • Customization Options (Premium): While the free version offers basic generation, the premium subscription unlocks advanced customization options like instrument layering, EQ adjustments, and the ability to export tracks in higher quality formats (WAV & MP3).
  • Looping & Variation: The app provides tools for creating loops from generated segments and generating variations on existing musical ideas.

Strengths

Several aspects contribute to Donna AI Song & Music Maker's popularity:

  • Ease of Use: The interface is remarkably intuitive, even for users with no prior music production experience. The simple ‚Äúdescribe your song‚Äù approach makes it incredibly accessible.
  • Rapid Generation: The app generates musical tracks surprisingly quickly ‚Äì typically within seconds ‚Äì allowing for rapid experimentation and iteration.
  • Genre Breadth: The wide range of supported genres allows users to explore various sonic landscapes, making the app versatile for different creative pursuits.
  • Image-to-Music Innovation: This unique feature sets Donna AI Song & Music Maker apart from many competing AI music generators, offering a novel approach to musical creation.
  • Large User Base & Community (Implied): The high number of installs suggests a thriving community and a wealth of user-generated content examples available for inspiration (though this isn't directly integrated within the app).

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Donna AI Song & Music Maker has room for improvement:

  • Musical Quality Consistency: While generation is fast, the quality of the generated music can vary significantly. Tracks often lack a cohesive musical structure and sometimes sound repetitive or generic.
  • Limited Creative Control (Free Version): The free version restricts user control over key parameters like instrumentation, tempo, and overall arrangement, limiting creative expression.
  • Lack of Granular Editing Tools: The app provides minimal tools for editing the generated music beyond basic looping. More sophisticated features would greatly enhance usability.
  • AI Lyric Generator Limitations: The AI lyric generator frequently produces nonsensical or grammatically awkward phrases, requiring significant manual correction.
  • Potential for Copyright Concerns: As with any AI-generated content, questions regarding copyright ownership and potential similarities to existing music remain a concern that needs further clarification.

User Experience

The user experience is largely positive, particularly for beginners. The app‚Äôs clean interface and straightforward workflow make it easy to get started. However, the lack of advanced controls in the free version can be frustrating for users seeking more control over their musical creations. Navigating between the different generation options (text, image, lyrics) feels seamless, but fine-tuning the output is hampered by the limited customization available. The app‚Äôs responsiveness is generally good, although occasional lag during music generation has been reported.

Value for Money

The free version of Donna AI Song & Music Maker offers a valuable entry point into AI music creation, allowing users to experiment with the core functionality without financial commitment. However, unlocking the full potential ‚Äì achieving higher-quality tracks, accessing advanced customization options, and exporting in premium formats ‚Äì requires subscribing to the premium tier. At present (October 26, 2023), the pricing for the premium subscription is $9.99 per month or $49.99 annually. Considering the limitations of the free version, the premium subscription represents a reasonable investment for serious music creators who are willing to pay for increased control and improved output quality.

Conclusion

Donna AI Song & Music Maker demonstrates significant promise as an accessible entry point into AI-powered music creation. Its ease of use, rapid generation capabilities, and unique image-to-music feature contribute to its popularity. However, the app‚Äôs limitations regarding musical quality consistency and creative control necessitate a cautious approach. While the free version is enjoyable for experimentation, prospective users should carefully consider whether the premium subscription offers sufficient value for their specific needs. The future success of Donna AI Song & Music Maker hinges on continued development aimed at improving music generation quality, expanding customization options, and addressing concerns regarding copyright and creative control. It‚Äôs a solid starting point but not yet a fully polished professional tool.
